00036 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'model.php');
00037 
00038 class Spamassassin extends Model
00039 {
00040     public $Name= 'spamassassin';
00041     public $User= 'root|_spamdaemon';
00042     
00043     private $confDir= '/etc/mail/spamassassin';
00044     private $re_LcSuffix= '/local-(\w+)\.cf$/';
00045     
00046     public $NVPS= '\h';
00047     public $ConfFile= '/etc/mail/spamassassin/local.cf';
00048     public $LogFile= '/var/log/maillog';
00049     
00051     public $VersionCmd= 'unset LC_ALL; unset LANG; /usr/local/bin/spamd -V';
00052 
00053     public $PidFile= '/var/run/spamassassin.pid';
00054 
00055     public $StartCmd= 'unset LC_ALL; unset LANG; /usr/local/bin/spamd -L -d -x -u _spamdaemon -r /var/run/spamassassin.pid';
00056 
00057     function Spamassassin()
00058     {
00059         global $TmpFile;
00060         
00061         parent::Model();
00062         
00063         $this->Proc= 'spamd';
00064 
00065         $this->StartCmd= "unset LC_ALL; unset LANG; /usr/local/bin/spamd -L -d -x -u _spamdaemon -r /var/run/spamassassin.pid > $TmpFile 2>&1 &";
00066         
00067         $this->Commands= array_merge(
00068             $this->Commands,
00069             array(
00070                 'GetCurrentLocale'  => array(
00071                     'argv'  => array(),
00072                     'desc'  => _('Get current locale'),
00073                     ),
00074                 
00075                 'GetLocales'    => array(
00076                     'argv'  => array(),
00077                     'desc'  => _('Get locales'),
00078                     ),
00079                 
00080                 'ChangeLocal'   => array(
00081                     'argv'  => array(NAME),
00082                     'desc'  => _('Change spamassassin local'),
00083                     ),
00084                 )
00085             );
00086     }
00087 
00088     function GetVersion()
00089     {
00090         return $this->RunShellCommand($this->VersionCmd.' | /usr/bin/head -2');
00091     }
00092     
00093     function Stop()
00094     {
00095         return $this->Kill();
00096     }
00097     
00100     function GetCurrentLocale()
00101     {
00102         $localcf= $this->confDir.'/local.cf';
00103         
00104         if (is_link($localcf) && ($linkedfile= readlink($localcf))) {
00105             if (preg_match($this->re_LcSuffix, $linkedfile, $match)) {
00106                 return $match[1];
00107             }
00108         }
00109         return FALSE;
00110     }
00111     
00114     function GetLocales()
00115     {
00116         $files= $this->GetFiles($this->confDir.'/local-*.cf');
00117         $files= explode("\n", $files);
00118 
00119         $locales= array();
00120         foreach ($files as $file) {
00121             if (!is_dir($file) && !preg_match('/.*\.(bak|orig)$/', $file)) {
00122                 if (preg_match($this->re_LcSuffix, $file, $match)) {
00123                     $locales[]= $match[1];
00124                 }
00125             }
00126         }
00127         return implode("\n", $locales);
00128     }
00129     
00132     function ChangeLocal($locale)
00133     {
00134         return $this->RunShellCommand("cd $this->confDir; /bin/ln -sf local-$locale.cf local.cf");
00135     }
00136     
00137     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00138     {
00139         if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00140             if (stripos($cols['Log'], 'clean message ') !== FALSE) {
00141                 $cols['Ham']= 1;
00142             }
00143             else if (stripos($cols['Log'], 'identified spam ') !== FALSE) {
00144                 $cols['Spam']= 1;
00145             }
00146 
00147             $re= '/^.* for (\S+):\S+ in (\d+\.\d+) seconds, (\d+) bytes\.$/';
00148             if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00149                 $cols['User']= $match[1];
00150                 $cols['Seconds']= $match[2];
00151                 $cols['Bytes']= $match[3];
00152             }
00153             return TRUE;
00154         }
00155         return FALSE;
00156     }
00157     
00158     function GetFileLineCount($file, $re= '')
00159     {
00160         $cmd= "/usr/bin/grep -a ' spamd\[' $file";
00161         if ($re !== '') {
00162             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00163             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a $re";
00164         }
00165         $cmd.= ' | /usr/bin/wc -l';
00166         
00167         // OpenBSD wc returns with leading blanks
00168         return trim($this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00169     }
00170     
00171     function GetLogs($file, $end, $count, $re= '')
00172     {
00173         $cmd= "/usr/bin/grep -a ' spamd\[' $file";
00174         if ($re !== '') {
00175             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00176             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a $re";
00177         }
00178         $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/head -$end | /usr/bin/tail -$count";
00179         
00180         $lines= explode("\n", $this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00181         
00182         $logs= array();
00183         foreach ($lines as $line) {
00184             unset($cols);
00185             if ($this->ParseLogLine($line, $cols)) {
00186                 $logs[]= $cols;
00187             }
00188         }
00189         return serialize($logs);
00190     }
00191     
00192     function GetLiveLogs($file, $count, $re= '')
00193     {
00194         $cmd= "/usr/bin/grep -a ' spamd\[' $file";
00195         if ($re !== '') {
00196             $re= escapeshellarg($re);
00197             $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/grep -a $re";
00198         }
00199         $cmd.= " | /usr/bin/tail -$count";
00200 
00201         $lines= explode("\n", $this->RunShellCommand($cmd));
00202         
00203         $logs= array();
00204         foreach ($lines as $line) {
00205             if ($this->ParseLogLine($line, $cols)) {
00206                 $logs[]= $cols;
00207             }
00208         }
00209         return serialize($logs);
00210     }
00211 }
